message.subject: Re: [RSVP] Impromtu Theatrical Performance Today!
message.body:
Hamlet,
The Queen and I sincerly look forward to attending your play. Glad to see that you're feeling better.
Your Uncle and King, Claudius

message.subject: Project Update
message.body:
My King,
He suspects nothing. Guildenstern and I should be home within the week.
-rosey
